item.description:
Meet for Dinner at 6:00pm at Friendly's: 140 Universal Drive N, North Haven, CT.

If you're not coming to dinner but wish to see the movie, please be at the theater by 7:25.
Its the 7:40 show at the Showcase in North Haven.


Looks like Master Windu owes Anakin a little payback!
Seriously, here's a new sci-fi thriller about a guy who can teleport and government agents hunting him to the end of the earth. The trailer looked cool, but judge for yourself:
http://movies.aol.com...

(BTW, if you ever saw Garden State, it turns out Natalie Portman is actually a great actress when she has decent material. I'm hoping that turns out to be the case with Hayden Christensen, but I guess we'll see.)
-Neil
203-645-2008
item.name: Movie Night: Jumper
